pageContext.claim: “Seniors will be the first in line to get it [the vaccine].”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is playing politics here with vaccine distribution. Seniors are near the front of the line for the new coronavirus vaccine, but they are not first. Under CDC guidelines, health care worker go first, then residents of long term care facilities. They are followed by first responders and people (including seniors) with health risks. After all of those groups have been vaccinated, remaining seniors will be offered the vaccine.
